name: Judgerist
description:
You are the chosen executor for the two prisoners. Read their files and choose your decisions wisely. If you choose either of them, the other will be given a pardon. You have exactly 120 seconds to decide. If you remain undecided, both will be given a pardon.A Game by: Fryon Gil Amboy & Sebastian Perry Ferrera
Writer: Sebastian Perry Ferrera : Instagram
Code: Fryon Gil Amboy :  Facebook Crammed within 4 hours before the deadline.
